org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel

Class DateUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.DateUtil
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HSSFDateUtil 

    public class DateUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for dealing with Excel dates.(包含处理Excel日期的方法。)

      static boolean isADateFormat(ExcelNumberFormat numFmt)
      Given a format ID and its format String, will check to see if the format represents a date format or not.(给定格式ID及其格式字符串，将检查该格式是否代表日期格式。)

      Given a format ID and its format String, will check to see if the format represents a date format or not.(给定格式ID及其格式字符串，将检查该格式是否代表日期格式。)
      static boolean isCellDateFormatted(Cell cell)
      Check if a cell contains a date Since dates are stored internally in Excel as double values we infer it is a date if it is formatted as such.(检查单元格是否包含日期由于日期在Excel中内部存储为双值，如果其格式如此，我们推断其为日期。)
      static boolean isCellDateFormatted(Cell cell, ConditionalFormattingEvaluator cfEvaluator)
      Check if a cell contains a date Since dates are stored internally in Excel as double values we infer it is a date if it is formatted as such.(检查单元格是否包含日期由于日期在Excel中内部存储为双值，如果其格式如此，我们推断其为日期。)
      static boolean isCellInternalDateFormatted(Cell cell)
      Check if a cell contains a date, checking only for internal excel date formats.(检查单元格是否包含日期，仅检查内部Excel日期格式。)
      static boolean isInternalDateFormat(int format)
      Given a format ID this will check whether the format represents an internal excel date format or not.(给定格式ID，将检查该格式是否代表内部Excel日期格式。)
      static boolean isValidExcelDate(double value)
      Given a double, checks if it is a valid Excel date.(给定双倍，检查它是否是有效的Excel日期。)

      • getExcelDate

        public static double getExcelDate(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Given a LocalDate, converts it into a double representing its internal Excel representation, which is the number of days since 1/1/1900. Fractional days represent hours, minutes, and seconds.(给定LocalDate，将其转换为代表其内部Excel表示的double，即自1900年1月1日以来的天数。小数日代表小时、分钟和秒。)
        Parameters:
        date - the Date(日期-日期)
        Returns:
        Excel representation of Date (-1 if error - test for error by checking for less than 0.1)(日期的Excel表示（如果错误，则为-1-通过检查是否小于0.1来测试错误）)

      • getExcelDate

        public static double getExcelDate(java.time.LocalDate date,
                                  boolean use1904windowing)
        Given a LocalDate, converts it into a double representing its internal Excel representation, which is the number of days since 1/1/1900. Fractional days represent hours, minutes, and seconds.(给定LocalDate，将其转换为代表其内部Excel表示的double，即自1900年1月1日以来的天数。小数日代表小时、分钟和秒。)
        Parameters:
        date - the Date(日期-日期)
        use1904windowing - Should 1900 or 1904 date windowing be used?(use 1904窗口化-应该使用1900还是1904日期窗口化？)
        Returns:
        Excel representation of Date (-1 if error - test for error by checking for less than 0.1)(日期的Excel表示（如果错误，则为-1-通过检查是否小于0.1来测试错误）)

      • getExcelDate

        public static double getExcelDate(java.time.LocalDateTime date)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getExcelDate

        public static double getExcelDate(java.util.Calendar date,
                                  boolean use1904windowing)
        Given a Date in the form of a Calendar, converts it into a double representing its internal Excel representation, which is the number of days since 1/1/1900. Fractional days represent hours, minutes, and seconds.(给定日历形式的日期，将其转换为代表其内部Excel表示的double，即自1900年1月1日以来的天数。小数日代表小时、分钟和秒。)
        Parameters:
        date - the Calendar holding the date to convert(日期-保存要转换的日期的日历)
        use1904windowing - Should 1900 or 1904 date windowing be used?(use 1904窗口化-应该使用1900还是1904日期窗口化？)
        Returns:
        Excel representation of Date (-1 if error - test for error by checking for less than 0.1)(日期的Excel表示（如果错误，则为-1-通过检查是否小于0.1来测试错误）)

      • getJavaDate

        public static java.util.Date getJavaDate(double date,
                                         java.util.TimeZone tz)
        Given an Excel date with using 1900 date windowing, and converts it to a java.util.Date. Excel Dates and Times are stored without any timezone information. If you know (through other means) that your file uses a different TimeZone to the system default, you can use this version of the getJavaDate() method to handle it.(使用1900日期窗口给定Excel日期，并将其转换为java.util.Date。Excel日期和时间存储时没有任何时区信息。如果您（通过其他方式）知道您的文件使用与系统默认值不同的时区，则可以使用此版本的getJava Date（）方法来处理它。)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        tz - The TimeZone to evaluate the date in(tz -用于评估日期的时区)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)

      • getJavaDate

        public static java.util.Date getJavaDate(double date)
        Given an Excel date with using 1900 date windowing, and converts it to a java.util.Date. NOTE: If the default TimeZone in Java uses Daylight Saving Time then the conversion back to an Excel date may not give the same value, that is the comparison excelDate == getExcelDate(getJavaDate(excelDate,false)) is not always true. For example if default timezone is Europe/Copenhagen, on 2004-03-28 the minute after 01:59 CET is 03:00 CEST, if the excel date represents a time between 02:00 and 03:00 then it is converted to past 03:00 summer time(使用1900日期窗口给定Excel日期，并将其转换为java. util. Date。注：如果Java中的默认TimeZone使用夏令时，那么转换回Excel日期可能不会给出相同的值，即比较exelDate == getExcelDate（getJava Date（exelDate，true））并不总是为真。例如，如果默认时区为欧洲/哥本哈根，则2004年3月28日CET 01：59后的分钟为CEST 03：00，如果Excel日期表示02：00至03：00之间的时间，则将其转换为过去03：00夏令时间)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)
        See Also:
        TimeZone

      • getJavaDate

        public static java.util.Date getJavaDate(double date,
                                         boolean use1904windowing,
                                         java.util.TimeZone tz)
        Given an Excel date with either 1900 or 1904 date windowing, converts it to a java.util.Date. Excel Dates and Times are stored without any timezone information. If you know (through other means) that your file uses a different TimeZone to the system default, you can use this version of the getJavaDate() method to handle it.(给定具有1900或1904日期窗口的Excel日期，将其转换为java.util.Date。Excel日期和时间存储时没有任何时区信息。如果您（通过其他方式）知道您的文件使用与系统默认值不同的时区，则可以使用此版本的getJava Date（）方法来处理它。)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        tz - The TimeZone to evaluate the date in(tz -用于评估日期的时区)
        use1904windowing - true if date uses 1904 windowing, or false if using 1900 date windowing.(use 1904窗口-如果日期使用1904窗口，则为真，如果使用1900日期窗口，则为假。)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)

      • getJavaDate

        public static java.util.Date getJavaDate(double date,
                                         boolean use1904windowing,
                                         java.util.TimeZone tz,
                                         boolean roundSeconds)
        Given an Excel date with either 1900 or 1904 date windowing, converts it to a java.util.Date. Excel Dates and Times are stored without any timezone information. If you know (through other means) that your file uses a different TimeZone to the system default, you can use this version of the getJavaDate() method to handle it.(给定具有1900或1904日期窗口的Excel日期，将其转换为java.util.Date。Excel日期和时间存储时没有任何时区信息。如果您（通过其他方式）知道您的文件使用与系统默认值不同的时区，则可以使用此版本的getJava Date（）方法来处理它。)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        tz - The TimeZone to evaluate the date in(tz -用于评估日期的时区)
        use1904windowing - true if date uses 1904 windowing, or false if using 1900 date windowing.(use 1904窗口-如果日期使用1904窗口，则为真，如果使用1900日期窗口，则为假。)
        roundSeconds - round to closest second(回合秒-回合到最近的秒)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)

      • getJavaDate

        public static java.util.Date getJavaDate(double date,
                                         boolean use1904windowing)
        Given an Excel date with either 1900 or 1904 date windowing, converts it to a java.util.Date. NOTE: If the default TimeZone in Java uses Daylight Saving Time then the conversion back to an Excel date may not give the same value, that is the comparison excelDate == getExcelDate(getJavaDate(excelDate,false)) is not always true. For example if default timezone is Europe/Copenhagen, on 2004-03-28 the minute after 01:59 CET is 03:00 CEST, if the excel date represents a time between 02:00 and 03:00 then it is converted to past 03:00 summer time(给定具有1900或1904日期窗口的Excel日期，将其转换为java. util. Date。注：如果Java中的默认TimeZone使用夏令时，那么转换回Excel日期可能不会给出相同的值，即比较exelDate == getExcelDate（getJava Date（exelDate，true））并不总是为真。例如，如果默认时区为欧洲/哥本哈根，则2004年3月28日CET 01：59后的分钟为CEST 03：00，如果Excel日期表示02：00至03：00之间的时间，则将其转换为过去03：00夏令时间)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        use1904windowing - true if date uses 1904 windowing, or false if using 1900 date windowing.(use 1904窗口-如果日期使用1904窗口，则为真，如果使用1900日期窗口，则为假。)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)
        See Also:
        TimeZone

      • getLocalDateTime

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime getLocalDateTime(double date)
        Given an Excel date with using 1900 date windowing, and converts it to a java.time.LocalDateTime. NOTE: If the default TimeZone in Java uses Daylight Saving Time then the conversion back to an Excel date may not give the same value, that is the comparison excelDate == getExcelDate(getLocalDateTime(excelDate,false)) is not always true. For example if default timezone is Europe/Copenhagen, on 2004-03-28 the minute after 01:59 CET is 03:00 CEST, if the excel date represents a time between 02:00 and 03:00 then it is converted to past 03:00 summer time(给定一个Excel日期，使用1900日期窗口，并将其转换为java. time. LocalDateTime。注：如果Java中的默认TimeZone使用夏令时，那么转换回Excel日期可能不会给出相同的值，也就是说比较exelDate == getExcelDate（getLocalDate，true））并不总是为真。例如，如果默认时区为欧洲/哥本哈根，则2004年3月28日CET 01：59后的分钟为CEST 03：00，如果Excel日期表示02：00至03：00之间的时间，则将其转换为过去03：00夏令时间)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)
        See Also:
        TimeZone

      • getLocalDateTime

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime getLocalDateTime(double date,
                                                       boolean use1904windowing)
        Given an Excel date with either 1900 or 1904 date windowing, converts it to a java.time.LocalDateTime. Excel Dates and Times are stored without any timezone information. If you know (through other means) that your file uses a different TimeZone to the system default, you can use this version of the getJavaDate() method to handle it.(给定具有1900或1904日期窗口的Excel日期，将其转换为java.time.LocalDateTime。Excel日期和时间存储时没有任何时区信息。如果您（通过其他方式）知道您的文件使用与系统默认值不同的时区，则可以使用此版本的getJava Date（）方法来处理它。)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        use1904windowing - true if date uses 1904 windowing, or false if using 1900 date windowing.(use 1904窗口-如果日期使用1904窗口，则为真，如果使用1900日期窗口，则为假。)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)

      • getLocalDateTime

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime getLocalDateTime(double date,
                                                       boolean use1904windowing,
                                                       boolean roundSeconds)
        Given an Excel date with either 1900 or 1904 date windowing, converts it to a java.time.LocalDateTime. Excel Dates and Times are stored without any timezone information. If you know (through other means) that your file uses a different TimeZone to the system default, you can use this version of the getJavaDate() method to handle it.(给定具有1900或1904日期窗口的Excel日期，将其转换为java.time.LocalDateTime。Excel日期和时间存储时没有任何时区信息。如果您（通过其他方式）知道您的文件使用与系统默认值不同的时区，则可以使用此版本的getJava Date（）方法来处理它。)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        use1904windowing - true if date uses 1904 windowing, or false if using 1900 date windowing.(use 1904窗口-如果日期使用1904窗口，则为真，如果使用1900日期窗口，则为假。)
        roundSeconds - round to closest second(回合秒-回合到最近的秒)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)

      • getJavaCalendar

        public static java.util.Calendar getJavaCalendar(double date)
        Get EXCEL date as Java Calendar (with default time zone). This is like getJavaDate(double) but returns a Calendar object.(获取Excel日期作为Java日历（具有默认时区）。这类似于getJava Date（double），但返回日历对象。)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)

      • getJavaCalendar

        public static java.util.Calendar getJavaCalendar(double date,
                                                 boolean use1904windowing)
        Get EXCEL date as Java Calendar (with default time zone). This is like getJavaDate(double, boolean) but returns a Calendar object.(获取Excel日期作为Java日历（具有默认时区）。这类似于getJava Date（double，布尔值），但返回日历对象。)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        use1904windowing - true if date uses 1904 windowing, or false if using 1900 date windowing.(use 1904窗口-如果日期使用1904窗口，则为真，如果使用1900日期窗口，则为假。)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)

      • getJavaCalendarUTC

        public static java.util.Calendar getJavaCalendarUTC(double date,
                                                    boolean use1904windowing)
        Get EXCEL date as Java Calendar with UTC time zone. This is similar to getJavaDate(double, boolean) but returns a Calendar object that has UTC as time zone, so no daylight saving hassle.(获取Excel日期作为带有UTC时区的Java日历。这与getJava Date（double，布尔值）类似，但返回一个以UTC为时区的Calendar对象，因此没有夏令时的麻烦。)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        use1904windowing - true if date uses 1904 windowing, or false if using 1900 date windowing.(use 1904窗口-如果日期使用1904窗口，则为真，如果使用1900日期窗口，则为假。)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date in UTC, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(以UTC表示日期的Java形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)

      • getJavaCalendar

        public static java.util.Calendar getJavaCalendar(double date,
                                                 boolean use1904windowing,
                                                 java.util.TimeZone timeZone)
        Get EXCEL date as Java Calendar with given time zone.(获取EXCEL日期作为Java日历与给定的时区。)
        Parameters:
        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        use1904windowing - true if date uses 1904 windowing, or false if using 1900 date windowing.(use 1904窗口-如果日期使用1904窗口，则为真，如果使用1900日期窗口，则为假。)
        timeZone - The TimeZone to evaluate the date in(时区-用于评估日期的时区)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)

      • getJavaCalendar

                                                 boolean use1904windowing,

                                                 boolean roundSeconds)

        date - The Excel date.(日期-Excel日期。)
        use1904windowing - true if date uses 1904 windowing, or false if using 1900 date windowing.(use 1904窗口-如果日期使用1904窗口，则为真，如果使用1900日期窗口，则为假。)
        timeZone - The TimeZone to evaluate the date in(时区-用于评估日期的时区)
        roundSeconds - round to closest second(回合秒-回合到最近的秒)
        Returns:
        Java representation of the date, or null if date is not a valid Excel date(日期的Java表示形式，如果日期不是有效的Excel日期，则为空)

      • isADateFormat

        public static boolean isADateFormat(ExcelNumberFormat numFmt)
        Given a format ID and its format String, will check to see if the format represents a date format or not. Firstly, it will check to see if the format ID corresponds to an internal excel date format (eg most US date formats) If not, it will check to see if the format string only contains date formatting characters (ymd-/), which covers most non US date formats.(给定格式ID及其格式字符串，将检查该格式是否代表日期格式。首先，它将检查格式ID是否对应于内部Excel日期格式（例如大多数美国日期格式）如果不对应，它将检查格式字符串是否仅包含日期格式字符（ymd-/），这涵盖了大多数非美国日期格式。)
        Parameters:
        numFmt - The number format index and string expression, or null if not specified(numFdt-数字格式索引和字符串表达，如果未指定，则为空)
        Returns:
        true if it is a valid date format, false if not or null(如果是有效的日期格式，则为真，如果不是或空，则为假)
        See Also:
        isInternalDateFormat(int)

      • isADateFormat

        public static boolean isADateFormat(int formatIndex,
                                    java.lang.String formatString)
        Given a format ID and its format String, will check to see if the format represents a date format or not. Firstly, it will check to see if the format ID corresponds to an internal excel date format (eg most US date formats) If not, it will check to see if the format string only contains date formatting characters (ymd-/), which covers most non US date formats.(给定格式ID及其格式字符串，将检查该格式是否代表日期格式。首先，它将检查格式ID是否对应于内部Excel日期格式（例如大多数美国日期格式）如果不对应，它将检查格式字符串是否仅包含日期格式字符（ymd-/），这涵盖了大多数非美国日期格式。)
        Parameters:
        formatIndex - The index of the format, eg from ExtendedFormatRecord.getFormatIndex(formatIndex -格式的索引，例如来自ExtendedDeliverRecord. getDeliverIndex)
        formatString - The format string, eg from FormatRecord.getFormatString(格式化字符串-格式字符串，例如来自Record. get字符串)
        Returns:
        true if it is a valid date format, false if not or null(如果是有效的日期格式，则为真，如果不是或空，则为假)
        See Also:
        isInternalDateFormat(int)

      • isInternalDateFormat

        public static boolean isInternalDateFormat(int format)
        Given a format ID this will check whether the format represents an internal excel date format or not.(给定格式ID，将检查该格式是否代表内部Excel日期格式。)
        See Also:
        isADateFormat(int, java.lang.String)

      • isCellDateFormatted

        public static boolean isCellDateFormatted(Cell cell)
        Check if a cell contains a date Since dates are stored internally in Excel as double values we infer it is a date if it is formatted as such.(检查单元格是否包含日期由于日期在Excel中内部存储为双值，如果其格式如此，我们推断其为日期。)
        Parameters:
        cell -(细胞-)
        Returns:
        true if it looks like a date(如果看起来像约会，那就正确了)
        See Also:
        isADateFormat(int, String), isInternalDateFormat(int)

      • isCellDateFormatted

        public static boolean isCellDateFormatted(Cell cell,
                                          ConditionalFormattingEvaluator cfEvaluator)
        Check if a cell contains a date Since dates are stored internally in Excel as double values we infer it is a date if it is formatted as such. Format is determined from applicable conditional formatting, if any, or cell style.(检查单元格是否包含日期由于日期在Excel中内部存储为双值，如果其格式如此，我们推断其为日期。格式根据适用的条件格式（如果有）或单元格样式确定。)
        Parameters:
        cell -(细胞-)
        cfEvaluator - if available, or null(sfEvolator-如果可用，或空)
        Returns:
        true if it looks like a date(如果看起来像约会，那就正确了)
        See Also:
        isADateFormat(int, String), isInternalDateFormat(int)

      • isCellInternalDateFormatted

        public static boolean isCellInternalDateFormatted(Cell cell)
        Check if a cell contains a date, checking only for internal excel date formats. As Excel stores a great many of its dates in "non-internal" date formats, you will not normally want to use this method.(检查单元格是否包含日期，仅检查内部Excel日期格式。由于Excel以“非内部”日期格式存储大量日期，因此您通常不想使用此方法。)
        See Also:
        isADateFormat(int,String), isInternalDateFormat(int)

      • isValidExcelDate

        public static boolean isValidExcelDate(double value)
        Given a double, checks if it is a valid Excel date.(给定双倍，检查它是否是有效的Excel日期。)
        Parameters:
        value - the double value(价值-双重价值)
        Returns:
        true if valid(如果有效，则为真)

      • absoluteDay

        protected static int absoluteDay(java.util.Calendar cal,
                                 boolean use1904windowing)
        Given a Calendar, return the number of days since 1900/12/31.(给定日历，返回自1900/12/31以来的天数。)
        Parameters:
        cal - the Calendar(cal -日历)
        Returns:
        days number of days since 1900/12/31(天数自1900/12/31以来的天数)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if date is invalid(java.lang. IllegalArgument异常-如果日期无效)

      • absoluteDay

        protected static int absoluteDay(java.time.LocalDateTime date,
                                 boolean use1904windowing)
        Given a LocalDateTime, return the number of days since 1900/12/31.(给定LocalDate，返回自1900/12/31以来的天数。)
        Parameters:
        date - the Date(日期-日期)
        Returns:
        days number of days since 1900/12/31(天数自1900/12/31以来的天数)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if date is invalid(java.lang. IllegalArgument异常-如果日期无效)

      • convertTime

        public static double convertTime(java.lang.String timeStr)
        Converts a string of format "HH:MM" or "HH:MM:SS" to its (Excel) numeric equivalent(将格式为“HH：MM”或“HH：MM：SS”的字符串复制为其（Excel）数字等效)
        Returns:
        a double between 0 and 1 representing the fraction of the day(0和1之间的双精度数，表示一天的分数)

      • parseYYYYMMDDDate

        public static java.util.Date parseYYYYMMDDDate(java.lang.String dateStr)
        Converts a string of format "YYYY/MM/DD" to its (Excel) numeric equivalent(将格式为“YYYY/MM/DD”的字符串转换为它的（Excel）等效数字)
        Returns:
        a double representing the (integer) number of days since the start of the Excel epoch(一个double，表示自Excel纪元开始以来的（整）天数)
